title: How to Play Lemons

steps.headline: Get a piece of notebook paper and a pen.
Label four categories on the paper.
steps.description: The categories are: Boys, Girls, Action, and Body Part. These are the base categories. You can always add more categories, such as Place or What They Were Wearing.

steps.headline: Arrange the categories, as shown above.
Make a list, based on the category.
List any action.
steps.description: In the action section, be creative and think of funny actions.

steps.headline: List body parts in the proper section.
steps.description: This also can be really funny.

steps.headline: Align the categories as in the picture above.
Number each item in the subcategory.
steps.description:
These are to be numbered from one to five in any order, like so: If you have 100 subcategories, number from one to 100. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a6\/PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg\/v4-460px-PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a6\/PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg\/v4-760px-PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":505.27472527472526,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Number the bottom of the paper from one to five.
steps.description: Do this as if you are doing homework problems.

steps.headline: Match the name and action.
steps.description: Write the corresponding name and action with the number they have.

text:
Get a piece of notebook paper and a pen. Label four categories on the paper. The categories are: Boys, Girls, Action, and Body Part. These are the base categories. You can always add more categories, such as Place or What They Were Wearing. Arrange the categories, as shown above. Make a list, based on the category. Under each category, list what the name states. For boys, name five boys that you know. It doesn't have to be five, it can be 100 if you really want. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/95/PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg/v4-460px-PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/95/PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg/v4-760px-PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":505.27472527472526,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} For girls, name five girls you know. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/PlayLemons-Step-5.jpg/v4-460px-PlayLemons-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/PlayLemons-Step-5.jpg/v4-760px-PlayLemons-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":505.27472527472526,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} List any action. In the action section, be creative and think of funny actions. List body parts in the proper section. This also can be really funny. Align the categories as in the picture above. Number each item in the subcategory. These are to be numbered from one to five in any order, like so: If you have 100 subcategories, number from one to 100. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a6/PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg/v4-460px-PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a6/PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg/v4-760px-PlayLemons-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":505.27472527472526,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Number the bottom of the paper from one to five. Do this as if you are doing homework problems. Match the name and action. Write the corresponding name and action with the number they have. Read out loud and laugh!
sentences: Get a piece of notebook paper and a pen.
Label four categories on the paper.
The categories are: Boys, Girls, Action, and Body Part.
These are the base categories.
You can always add more categories, such as Place or What They Were Wearing.
Arrange the categories, as shown above.
Make a list, based on the category.
Under each category, list what the name states.
For boys, name five boys that you know.
It doesn't have to be five, it can be 100 if you really want.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/95\/PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg\/v4-460px-PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/95\/PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg\/v4-760px-PlayLemons-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":505.27472527472526,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} For girls, name five girls you know.

In the action section, be creative and think of funny actions.
List body parts in the proper section.
This also can be really funny.
Align the categories as in the picture above.
Number each item in the subcategory.

These are to be numbered from one to five in any order, like so:
If you have 100 subcategories, number from one to 100.

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Number the bottom of the paper from one to five.
Do this as if you are doing homework problems.
Match the name and action.
Write the corresponding name and action with the number they have.
Read out loud and laugh!
